lead_paragraph: A distinguished London linguist makes a wager with a colleague that he can transform a working-class girl into an elegant, mannered lady, free of all bad accents.  When he finds his subject, he turns her into the belle of high-society, but can't admit to himself that he's fallen in love with her.
